TEXT.English: [TAB]In the jargon of law enforcement and intelligence agencies, a safe house is a secure location, suitable for hiding witnesses, agents or other persons perceived as being in danger. It may also refer to a place where undercover operatives may conduct clandestine observations or meet other operatives surreptitiously. Typically, the significance of safe houses is kept secret from all but a limited number of people, for the safety of those hidden within them.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Den of Spies[COLOR_REVERT] permenantly reduces production and science in a target city.

TEXT.German: This permanent building is created by enemy espionage actions.

TEXT.English: [TAB]People are social and they want to belong to special groups. Group members share common interests, influence each other, and share rules and values. Primary groups are those with the most influence, such as family members; secondary groups have less interaction than the primary group, such as clubs and organizations. As children grow into teenagers, their parents become less of an influence and peer groups become more of an influence. All groups exert what is called social power; some groups have more power than others over consumers’ decisions.

All groups exert what is called social power; some groups have more power than others over consumers’ decisions.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Misinformation is false or inaccurate information that is spread unintentionally. It is distinguished from disinformation by motive in that misinformation is simply erroneous, while disinformation, in contrast, is intended to mislead. Adam Makkai proposes the distinction between misinformation and disinformation to be a defining characteristic of idioms in the English language. An utterance is only idiomatic if it involves disinformation, where the listener can decode the utterance in a logical, and lexically correct, yet erroneous way. Where the listener simply decodes the lexemes incorrectly, the utterance is simply misinformation, and not idiomatic. Damian Thompson defines counterknowledge as "misinformation packaged to look like fact. "Using the definition above, this may refer to disinformation, as the motive is deliberate and often pecuniary.

TEXT.English: [TAB]A marriage of convenience (plural marriages of convenience) is a marriage contracted for reasons other than the reasons of relationship, family, or love. Instead, such a marriage is orchestrated for personal gain or some other sort of strategic purpose, such as political marriage. The phrase is a calque of French: mariage de convenance - a marriage of convention, or marriage of suitability. In the cases when it represents a fraud, it is called sham marriage.
TEXT.French: [TAB]A marriage of convenience (plural marriages of convenience) is a marriage contracted for reasons other than the reasons of relationship, family, or love. Instead, such a marriage is orchestrated for personal gain or some other sort of strategic purpose, such as political marriage. The phrase is a calque of French: mariage de convenance - a marriage of convention, or marriage of suitability. In the cases when it represents a fraud, it is called sham marriage.

TEXT.English: Citizens in %s1 have begun rioting and looting after a notorious rebel faction killed the city governor in his mansion.

TEXT.English: Upon successfully completing the mission the %s1_unit is moving on near %s2_CityName.
TEXT.French: Après avoir complété la mission, l'unité : %s1_unit est revenue saine et sauve à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Nach Beendigung der Mission ist die Einheit %s1_unit sicher nach %s2_city zurückgekehrt.
TEXT.Italian: Dopo aver completato la missione, l'unità %s1_unit è tornata sana e salva a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Tras completar la misión, [NUM1:el:la:los:las] %s1_unit [NUM1:ha:ha:han:han] vuelto a salvo a %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Elements loyal to another empire have ruined a relationship at %s1_CityName!

TEXT.Spanish: Elements loyal to another empire have ruined a relationship at %s1_CityName!

TEXT.Italian: %s1_CityName has been the target of a covert action.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CityName has been the target of a covert action.

TEXT.Italian: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 infiltrators have supported a rebellion within our lands!

TEXT.Italian: A political marriage has been arranged at %s1_CityName!
TEXT.Spanish: A political marriage has been arranged at %s1_CityName!

TEXT.English: A %s1_ThingName was assassinated by enemy infiltrators at %s2_CityName!
TEXT.French: Un %s1_ThingName a été assassiné par les envahisseurs ennemis à %s2_CityName!
TEXT.German: Ein %s1_ThingName wurde durch einen feindlichen Geheimdienst in %s2_CityName ermordet!
TEXT.Italian: A %s1_ThingName was assassinated by enemy infiltrators at %s2_CityName!
TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_ThingName fue asesinado por los infiltrados enemigos en %s2_CityName!
TEXT.Finnish: A %s1_ThingName was assassinated by enemy infiltrators at %s2_CityName!

TEXT.English: A %s1_ThingName was bribed by enemy infiltrators!
TEXT.French: Un %s1_ThingName a été suborné par les envahisseurs ennemis!
TEXT.German: Ein %s1_ThingName wurde durch einen feindlichen Geheimdienst bestochen!
TEXT.Italian: Un %s1_ThingName è stato corrotto dagli infiltrati nemici!
TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_ThingName fue sobornado por los infiltrados enemigos!
TEXT.Finnish: A %s1_ThingName was bribed by enemy infiltrators!

TEXT.English: A %s1_ThingName was bribed by enemy infiltrators near %s2_CityName!

TEXT.German: Ein %s1_ThingName wurde einen feindlichen Geheimdienst nahe %s2_CityName bestochen!

TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_ThingName fue sobornado por los infiltrados enemigos cerca de %s2_CityName!
TEXT.Finnish: A %s1_ThingName was bribed by enemy infiltrators near %s2_CityName!

TEXT.English: A %s1_ThingName was destroyed by enemy infiltrators!

TEXT.German: Eine %s1_ThingName wurde durch einen feindlichen Geheimdienst zerstört!
TEXT.Italian: Un %s1_ThingName si è distrutto dagli infiltrati nemici!
TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_ThingName fue destruido por los infiltrados enemigos!
TEXT.Finnish: A %s1_ThingName was destroyed by enemy infiltrators!

TEXT.English: A %s1_ThingName was destroyed by enemy infiltrators near %s2_CityName!
TEXT.German: Eine %s1_ThingName nahe %s2_CityName wurde durch einen feindlichen Geheimdienst zerstört!
TEXT.Finnish: A %s1_ThingName was destroyed by enemy infiltrators near %s2_CityName!

TEXT.English: A dirty bomb was used! Radioactive fallout has covered the area!
TEXT.French: Une bombe sale a été employée! Les retombées radioactives radioactives ont couvert le domaine!
TEXT.German: Eine schmutzige Bombe wurde benutzt! Die betroffenen Gebiete wurden radioaktiv kontaminiert
TEXT.Italian: Una bomba sporca è stata usata! La precipitazione radioattiva radioattiva ha riguardato la zona!
TEXT.Spanish: Una bomba sucia fue utilizada! El polvillo radiactivo radiactivo ha cubierto el área!
TEXT.Finnish: A dirty bomb was used, radioactive fallout has covered the area!

TEXT.English: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.French: Les Pacifistes se rassemblent dans %s1 et engendrent des troubles que les autorités locales peinent à contrôler.
TEXT.German: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Italian: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Spanish: Anti-War Rallies in %s1 have been causing trouble for local officials.

TEXT.English: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.French: Les Pacifistes se rassemblent dans %s1, incités par un espion %s2, et engendrent des troubles que les autorités locales peinent à contrôler.
TEXT.German: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Italian: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.
TEXT.Spanish: Anti-War Rallies in %s1, incited by a %s2 spy, have been causing trouble for local officials.

TEXT.English: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.French: Permet des actes offensifs importants pour les espions, comme le sabotage nucléaire, le soutien aux factions rebelles, pouvant mener à un désordre au niveau de l'Empire. Les effets de l'espionnages sont également revus pour s'adapter à la vitesse du Jeu.
TEXT.German: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.Italian: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows for powerful espionage attacks, including nuclear sabatoge, aiding rebel factions, and causing empire-wide anarchy. Also, espionage effects, like poisoning water, will correctly scale for gamespeeds.

TEXT.English: Enables spies to return to nearest city, rather than capital city.
TEXT.French: Enables spies to return to nearest city, rather than capital city.
TEXT.German: Enables spies to return to nearest city, rather than capital city.
TEXT.Italian: Enables spies to return to nearest city, rather than capital city.
TEXT.Spanish: Enables spies to return to nearest city, rather than capital city.

TEXT.English: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.French: L'Electricité de la Ville de %s1 a été restaurée.
TEXT.German: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.Italian: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.
TEXT.Spanish: Power in the city of %s1 has been restored.

TEXT.English: The spy attempts to kill a great specialist inside a rival city.
TEXT.French: L'espion essaye de tuer un grand spécialiste à l'intérieur d'une ville rivale.
TEXT.German: Versucht eine großen Spezialisten in einer feindlichen Stadt zu ermorden.
TEXT.Italian: La spia tenta di uccidere un grande specialista all'interno di una città rivale.
TEXT.Spanish: El espía intenta matar a un gran especialista dentro de una ciudad rival.
TEXT.Finnish: The spy attempts to kill a great specialist inside a rival city.

TEXT.English: The spy attempts to win the allegiance of a foreign worker.
TEXT.French: L'espion essaye de gagner l'allégeance d'un travailleur étranger.
TEXT.Italian: La spia tenta di vincere la fedeltà dei lavoratori stranieri.
TEXT.Spanish: El espía intenta ganar la lealtad de un trabajador extranjero.

TEXT.English: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus
TEXT.French: Cette Unité va récolter des Informations et devenir à nouveau active lorsqu'elle aura atteint son bonus maximum d'espionnage.
TEXT.German: Diese Einheit wird Informationen sammeln und nicht aufwachen bis sie ihr Maximum an Spionagepunkten erreicht hat
TEXT.Italian: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus
TEXT.Spanish: This unit will gather intelligence and not awaken until it reaches the maximum espionage bonus

TEXT.English: Focusing on espionage converts production into espionage within that particular city.
TEXT.French: Si vous favorisez le espionnage, la production est transformée en espionnage dans cette ville.
TEXT.German: Schwerpunkt auf Kultur wandelt in dieser Stadt Produktionserträge [ICON_PRODUCTION] in Spionageerträge [ICON_ESPIONAGE] um.
TEXT.Italian: Concentrandoti su spionaggio, trasformerai la produzione in spionaggio in una determinata città.
TEXT.Spanish: Al centrarse en el espionaje, la producción se convierte en cultura en esa ciudad en concreto.

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] probabilità di fuga di indennità di %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] ocasión del escape de la prima del %d1_percent%%

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] indennità di evasione di rilevazione di %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] prima de la evasión de la detección del %d1_percent%%

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] révolte de ville de bonification de %d1_percent%% des missions
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] sommossa della città di indennità di %d1_percent%% dalle missioni
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] rebelión de la ciudad de la prima del %d1_percent%% de misiones

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] malaise de bonification de %d1_percent%% des missions
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] agitazione di indennità di %d1_percent%% dalle missioni
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] malestar de la prima del %d1_percent%% de misiones

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] bonification ennemie de détection d'espion de %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] indennità nemica di rilevazione della spia di %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] prima enemiga de la detección del espía del %d1_percent%%

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] bonification de %d1_percent%% aux missions de contre- espionnage
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] indennità di %d1_percent%% alle missioni di contro spionaggio
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] prima del %d1_percent%% a las misiones del espionaje contrario

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] maladie de bonification de %d1_percent%% des missions
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] malattia di indennità di %d1_percent%% dalle missioni
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] enfermedad de la prima del %d1_percent%% de misiones

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Crée des retombées radioactives sur des améliorations sabotées.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Genera la precipitazione radioattiva sui miglioramenti sabotati.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Crea el polvillo radiactivo en mejoras saboteadas.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente la durée des effets sur les Leaders
[ICON_BULLET]Augmente la durée des effets sur les Leaders

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic bonus from Political Marriage
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% d'augmentation des bonus diplomatique provenant des Unions politiques
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic bonus from Political Marriage
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic bonus from Political Marriage
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic bonus from Political Marriage

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic penalty from Cause Incident
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% d'augmentation des pénalités diplomatiques en raison des incidents causés
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic penalty from Cause Incident
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic penalty from Cause Incident
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to diplomatic penalty from Cause Incident

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to effect duration of successful mission
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% d'augmentation de la durée des effets en cas de succès de la mission
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to effect duration of successful mission
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to effect duration of successful mission
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% increase to effect duration of successful mission

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente la durée de défenses réduites et des mensonges
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente la durée de défenses réduites et des mensonges
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Increase duration of Lower Defenses and Spread Lies
[ICON_BULLET] prima libre de la preparación del %d1_percent%%

TEXT.English: A %s1_unit managed to escape from the %s2_civ_adjective city of %s3_city!
TEXT.French: Un %s1_unit est parvenu à s'échapper de la ville de %s2_civ_adjective de %s3_city!
TEXT.German: Einem %[s1_unit]en gelang die Flucht aus der %s2_civ_adjective Stadt %s3_city!
TEXT.Italian: Un %s1_unit è riuscito a fuoriuscire dalla città di %s2_civ_adjective di %s3_city!
TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_unit manejó escaparse de la ciudad de %s2_civ_adjective de %s3_city!
TEXT.Finnish: A %s1_unit managed to escape from the %s2_civ_adjective city of %s3_city!

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective %s2_unit managed to escape from the %s3_civ_adjective city of %s4_city!
TEXT.French: Un %s1_civ_adjective %s2_unit est parvenu à s'échapper de la ville de %s3_civ_adjective de %s4_city!
TEXT.German: Ein %[s1_civ_adjective]er %s2_unit konnte aus der %[s3_civ_adjective]en Stadt %s4_city entkommen!
TEXT.Italian: Un %s1_civ_adjective %s2_unit è riuscito a fuoriuscire dalla città di %s3_civ_adjective di %s4_city!
TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_civ_adjective %s2_unit manejó escaparse de la ciudad de %s3_civ_adjective de %s4_city!
TEXT.Finnish: A %s1_civ_adjective %s2_unit managed to escape from the %s3_civ_adjective city of %s4_city!

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Peut échapper à la capture (la chance de %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Puede escapar la captura (la ocasión del %d1_Amount%%)

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Peut éluder la détection ennemie (la chance de %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Può eludere la rilevazione nemica (probabilità di %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Puede evadir la detección enemiga (la ocasión del %d1_Amount%%)

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Peut arrêter les espions ennemis (la chance de %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Può intercettare le spie nemiche (probabilità di %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Puede interceptar a los espías enemigos (la ocasión del %d1_Amount%%)
